Uses of Package
org.jogger.config

Packages that use org.jogger.config
org.jogger Contains API interfaces and the JoggerServlet 
org.jogger.config   
org.jogger.router Provides everything related to routes such as parsing and loading from the routes.config file. 
org.jogger.support Some helper classes that provide common functionality to other internal classes. 
org.jogger.test The testing infrastructure for Jogger applications. 
 

Classes in org.jogger.config used by org.jogger
ConfigurationException
          Usually thrown when there is a problem loading a controller or an interceptor.
Interceptors
          This is the mechanism that web applications use for registering interceptors.
